duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a territory business plan to achieve assigned sales quotas for Restorative Therapies products.
Maintain product knowledge, business acumen, and sales processes for Restorative Therapies products.
Conduct clinical/reimbursement in-service training programs with customers and educate patients on product use.
Assist with market surveys, product idea evaluations, and inventory/sample control processes.
Stay current with company communications and embrace corporate values with regards to administrative responsibilities.
Conduct business in a compliant and ethical manner, following Bioventus' Code of Compliance and Ethics.

education_certification.credential: 4-year college degree or equivalent experience in sales or relevant clinical experience
